alert.note: Alert for Bulloch; Effingham; Inland Bryan (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 7:02PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF BRYAN, BULLOCH AND EFFINGHAM COUNTIES... At 702 PM EDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm near Lanier, or near Pembroke. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...strong winds 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar Indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Some locations in the path of this storm include... Springfield, Pembroke, Lanier, Rincon, Guyton, Brooklet, Marlow and Eden. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so. You can also email your report to nws.charlestonsc@noaa.gov.
